abilities.name: Frost Blades
about: Attacks enemies with increased range, releasing icy blades from the first enemy hit which fly at other enemies

abilities.name: Blizzard
about: The snowstorm protects encounter, giving a chance to avoid damage while encounter stands in it

abilities.name: Ice Spear Totems
about: Spawns 3 totems in a triangular shape that cast Ice Spears between them

abilities.name: Breach Pillar
about: Spawns a breach pillar that once passed through spawns monsters
